issue.title: [Java] Implement hash table and equals & hashCode API for dictionary encoding
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5902](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5902). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4792>

Implement a hash table to only store hash & index, meanwhile add check equal function in ValueVector API.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5902?focusedCommentId=16888487) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
